Sentencas: The exhaust heat released from SOFCs (solid oxide fuel cells) possesses tremendous energy that can be recovered for energy cascade utilization.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and parameter optimization of a hybrid system based on SOFC and graphene-collector thermionic energy converter

Sentencas: Nevertheless, low conversion efficiency or power density limits the SOFC's high-grade waste heat recovery capabilities for the cogeneration of electric power.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and parameter optimization of a hybrid system based on SOFC and graphene-collector thermionic energy converter

Sentencas: To address this challenge, a novel hybrid system coupling a SOFC with a GTEC (graphene-collector thermionic energy converter) is proposed, where the GTEC harvests the high-grade exhaust heat produced by the SOFC and generates extra electricity.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and parameter optimization of a hybrid system based on SOFC and graphene-collector thermionic energy converter

Sentencas: It is found that the maximum power density of the hybrid system can reach 0.774 W/cm2 at 1073 K, which is 1.20 times higher than that of the sole SOFC, indicating that the hybrid system offers a considerable improvement in output performance.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and parameter optimization of a hybrid system based on SOFC and graphene-collector thermionic energy converter

Sentencas: Additionally, the optimal operating conditions and major parameter designs of the hybrid system are determined from the perspective of finite -time thermodynamics.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and parameter optimization of a hybrid system based on SOFC and graphene-collector thermionic energy converter

Sentencas: Choosing the optimal area ratio, increasing the SOFC operating temperature, enhancing the heat transfer coefficient, decreasing the thermal emissivity, and fabricating the perfect optical reflector can further improve the optimal performance of the hybrid system.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and parameter optimization of a hybrid system based on SOFC and graphene-collector thermionic energy converter

Sentencas: Compared with other SOFC-based hybrid systems, the SOFC-GTEC provides better output performance, proving that the GTEC can more efficiently utilize the exhaust heat produced by SOFC than other energy harvesting devices.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and parameter optimization of a hybrid system based on SOFC and graphene-collector thermionic energy converter

Sentencas: This work provides crucial theoretical guidance on the optimal designs and parametric analysis of SOFC-GTEC hybrid systems, thus paving the way towards developing high-performance SOFC cogeneration systems.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and parameter optimization of a hybrid system based on SOFC and graphene-collector thermionic energy converter
